name: HoleGuard
description:
HoleGuard You orbit automatically around the black hole as a little spaceship and try to protect it from incoming objects to hold it stable! Keep in mind that crates give you either a fifth of the life of the black hole back or when you destroy it, you get one bomb! Shoot - Space / X Shoot Bombs - Y Rotate - A/D Change Line/Speed - W / S

Music - by me

Sounds - also by me (only the Explosion-Sound isn´t my creation!)
